p.span: Find the latest district information regarding the corona virus at www.ComstockPS.org/CoronaVirus

On Monday, April 20th, Comstock Public Schools implemented a Continuity of Learning Plan. The plan utilizes both online and traditional paper formats. We have designed a blended approach to meet the needs of our diverse population. For the students who are comfortable in an online environment, learning will occur primarily through the student’s Google Classrooms. For students who prefer a more traditional option, paper packets are available. Whether a student chooses online learning or a paper packet, the learning opportunities are designed to be the same.
Please review our Continuity of Learning Plan.

span.span: The Comstock Board of Education meets on the second and fourth Mondays of each month. These meetings are open to the public.
The next board meetings are scheduled for:

br.span:
Regular Meeting — PLEASE NOTE
WEB STREAMED BOARD MEETING
Comstock Public Schools will be live-streaming the April 27 board meeting at 6 p.m. EDT on our Youtube channel:

br.br: If you are interested in making a comment to the board, please fill out the form at this link: https://bit.ly/ColtComments - You will be provided with the necessary information to call in during the meeting.

br.span: Find upcoming meeting agendas and minutes here: http://bit.ly/CPSboard

p.span: Please contact Faye Goldner in the office of the superintendent at

span.span: or 269-250-8907 if you have questions about the meetings, minutes, or the agenda.

span.style: font-size: large; font-family: latoregular; color: rgb(149, 179, 215);
font-size: large; font-family: latoregular; color: rgb(149, 179, 215);

span.em:
The mission of the Comstock Public Schools is to serve our community by supporting, inspiring, and challenging every person within the school district to reach their full potential through education.
The vision of the Comstock Public Schools is to be an educational community where every person is empowered to reach their full potential.

div.div: Free meals are available for pick-up between 11:30 am and 12:30 pm at four locations in the Comstock area....
Dr. Robert Hamet served as the Comstock Public Schools' Superintendent from 1976 until his retirement in 2001. He recently passed away at the age of 8...
